text:
Tanzania's Health Minister Ummy Mwalimu tests positive for coronavirus. Last week she suspended the head of the country’s national test lab, after President Magufuli railed against the agency for reporting more positive virus cases than he liked to see.
https://t.co/Lw5Ovzsmfn

entity.name: Coronavirus: Human trials for experimental vaccine begin in the US
entity.description:
Pharmaceutical companies Pfizer and BioNTech confirmed the start of human trials for a potential coronavirus vaccine. If successful, the vaccine could be in "emergency use" starting in September, officials say.
